text: Dr. Goh is an excellent doctor who has knowledge, care, and attention to detail. His professionalism, patience, and ability to answer all my questions made me feel comfortable and at ease throughout the process. My high recommendation goes out to Dr. Goh's clinic.

Dr. Malcolm Goh is a brilliant doctor. He has an uncanny ability to pinpoint the source of the symptoms with remarkable accuracy. He's very thorough, asking detailed questions that sometimes feel a bit intrusive but I feel it's necessary questions to be asked. However, I understand that his probing is driven by a desire to get a complete picture of my health. I appreciate his dedication to finding the right diagnosis and providing effective treatment. Once you get to know Dr. Goh, you'll come to realize he's actually caring at heart.

Came here to get advice on a health scare and although it turned out to be nothing Dr. Goh was not dismissive about it at all and was really patient with addressing my concerns, which I really appreciate.

Have visited Dr Goh for 34 years. Dr Goh is an extremely caring and knowledgeable doctor who always gives professional medical advice to his patients. The nurses are always friendly and helpful towards any medical queries made by every patient. It’s the best clinic in Hougang area.

I first went to Dr Goh a few years ago to seek help for my stomach issues and very poor appetite. After seeing him a couple times after starting on very routine and regular medication, Dr Goh has successfully helped me to regain my appetite (fixed my appetite and hunger timings). Throughout this semi-term medication to readjust my stomach’s acids, I have also learned how to have a better outlook towards eating. I don’t have an eating disorder but my hunger and appetite were very out of sorts. This in turn, eased my anxiety and helped me to get better. To this date, I am still doing very well!
